description: Represents a privacy budget within a collaboration

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CALENDAR_DAY | CALENDAR_MONTH | CALENDAR_WEEK | LIFETIME  
Update requires: No interruption

Budget.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

AutoRefresh.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED
